document.full_text: russian prime minister vladimir putin's ruling party was on course to win regional elections marred by allegations of fraud on sunday, the last big test of its support before parliamentary and presidential polls.
document.title: putin's party set for success in russian polls
lines_and_colors: russian prime minister vladimir putin's ruling party was on course to win regional elections marred by allegations of fraud on sunday, the last big test of its support before parliamentary and presidential polls.
